segments.source_content:
---
slug: /migration/v2/translated-sites
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # Translated sites

translations.zh-hant: # 已翻譯的網站

segments.source_content: This page explains how migrate a translated Docusaurus v1 site to Docusaurus v2.

translations.zh-hant: 本頁面說明如何將已翻譯的 Docusaurus v1 網站遷移至 Docusaurus v2。

segments.source_content: ## i18n differences {#i18n-differences}

translations.zh-hant: ## 國際化差異 {#i18n-differences}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v2 i18n is conceptually quite similar to Docusaurus v1 i18n with a few differences.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus v2 的國際化功能在概念上與 Docusaurus v1 相似，但存在一些差異。

segments.source_content: It is not tightly coupled to Crowdin, and you can use Git or another SaaS instead.

translations.zh-hant: 它不再與 Crowdin 緊密耦合，您可以改用 Git 或其他 SaaS 服務。

segments.source_content: ### Different filesystem paths {#different-filesystem-paths}

translations.zh-hant: ### 不同的檔案系統路徑 {#different-filesystem-paths}

segments.source_content: On Docusaurus v2, localized content is generally found at `website/i18n/[locale]`.

translations.zh-hant: 在 Docusaurus v2 中，本地化內容通常位於 `website/i18n/[locale]`。

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v2 is modular based on a plugin system, and each plugin is responsible to manage its own translations.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus v2 基於插件系統模組化，每個插件負責管理自己的翻譯。

segments.source_content: Each plugin has its own i18n subfolder, like: `website/i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-blog`

translations.zh-hant: 每個插件都有自己的國際化子資料夾，例如：`website/i18n/fr/docusaurus-plugin-content-blog`

segments.source_content: ### Updated translation APIs {#updated-translation-apis}

translations.zh-hant: ### 更新的翻譯 API {#updated-translation-apis}

segments.source_content: With Docusaurus v1, you translate your pages with `<translate>`:

translations.zh-hant: 在 Docusaurus v1 中，您使用 `<translate>` 來翻譯頁面：

segments.source_content:
```jsx const translate = require('../../server/translate.js').translate;

This header will be translated

; ```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_08021a08

segments.source_content: On Docusaurus v2, you translate your pages with `<Translate>`

translations.zh-hant: 在 Docusaurus v2 中，您使用 `<Translate>` 來翻譯頁面

segments.source_content:
```jsx import Translate from '@docusaurus/Translate';

This header will be translated

; ```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_de8f60af

segments.source_content:
:::note

The `write-translations` CLI still works to extract translations from your code.

The code translations are now added to `i18n/[locale]/code.json` using Chrome i18n JSON format.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

`write-translations` CLI 仍然可用於從代碼中提取翻譯。

代碼翻譯現在會以 Chrome 國際化 JSON 格式添加到 `i18n/[locale]/code.json` 中。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Stricter Markdown parser {#stricter-markdown-parser}

translations.zh-hant: ### 更嚴格的 Markdown 解析器 {#stricter-markdown-parser}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v2 is using [MDX](https://mdxjs.com/) to parse Markdown files.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus v2 使用 [MDX](https://mdxjs.com/) 來解析 Markdown 檔案。

segments.source_content: MDX compiles Markdown files to React components, is stricter than the Docusaurus v1 parser, and will make your build fail on error instead of rendering some bad content.

translations.zh-hant: MDX 將 Markdown 檔案編譯為 React 組件，比 Docusaurus v1 的解析器更嚴格，會在遇到錯誤時使構建失敗，而不是渲染一些不良內容。

segments.source_content: Also, the HTML elements must be replaced by JSX elements.

translations.zh-hant: 此外，HTML 元素必須替換為 JSX 元素。

segments.source_content: This is particularly important for i18n because if your translations are not good on Crowdin and use invalid Markup, your v2 translated site might fail to build: you may need to do some translation cleanup to fix the errors.

translations.zh-hant: 這對於國際化尤其重要，因為如果您的 Crowdin 翻譯不佳且使用了無效的標記，您的 v2 翻譯網站可能會構建失敗：您可能需要進行一些翻譯清理來修復這些錯誤。

segments.source_content: ## Migration strategies {#migration-strategies}

translations.zh-hant: ## 遷移策略 {#migration-strategies}

segments.source_content: This section will help you figure out how to **keep your existing v1 translations after you migrate to v2**.

translations.zh-hant: 本節將幫助您了解如何在遷移到 v2 後**保留現有的 v1 翻譯**。

segments.source_content: There are **multiple possible strategies** to migrate a Docusaurus v1 site using Crowdin, with different tradeoffs.

translations.zh-hant: 對於使用 Crowdin 的 Docusaurus v1 網站，有**多種可能的策略**可以進行遷移，每種策略都有不同的權衡。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

This documentation is a best-effort to help you migrate, please help us improve it if you find a better way!

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

本文檔是為了幫助您遷移而盡力編寫的，如果您找到更好的方法，請幫助我們改進！

:::

segments.source_content: Before all, we recommend to:

translations.zh-hant: 首先，我們建議：

segments.source_content:
- Migrate your v1 Docusaurus site to v2 without the translations
- Get familiar with the [new i18n system of Docusaurus v2](../../i18n/i18n-introduction.mdx) an
- Make Crowdin work for your v2 site, using a new and untranslated Crowdin project and the [Crowdin tutorial](../../i18n/i18n-crowdin.mdx)

translations.zh-hant:
- 在不包含翻譯的情況下將您的 v1 Docusaurus 網站遷移至 v2
- 熟悉 [Docusaurus v2 的新國際化系統](../../i18n/i18n-introduction.mdx)
- 使用一個新的、未翻譯的 Crowdin 項目和 [Crowdin 教程](../../i18n/i18n-crowdin.mdx) 讓 Crowdin 為您的 v2 網站工作

segments.source_content:
:::danger

Don't try to migrate without understanding both Crowdin and Docusaurus v2 i18n.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::danger

在未理解 Crowdin 和 Docusaurus v2 國際化的情況下，請勿嘗試遷移。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Create a new Crowdin project {#create-a-new-crowdin-project}

translations.zh-hant: ### 創建新的 Crowdin 項目 {#create-a-new-crowdin-project}

segments.source_content: To avoid any **risk of breaking your v1 site in production**, one possible strategy is to duplicate the original v1 Crowdin project.

translations.zh-hant: 為了避免**破壞您的 v1 生產環境網站**，一種可能的策略是複製原始的 v1 Crowdin 項目。

segments.source_content:
:::info

This strategy was used to [upgrade the Jest website](https://jestjs.io/blog/2021/03/09/jest-website-upgrade).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info

此策略曾用於 [升級 Jest 網站](https://jestjs.io/blog/2021/03/09/jest-website-upgrade)。

:::

segments.source_content: Unfortunately, Crowdin does not have any "Duplicate/clone Project" feature, which makes things complicated.

translations.zh-hant: 不幸的是，Crowdin 沒有「複製/克隆項目」功能，這使得事情變得複雜。

segments.source_content:
- Download the translation memory of your original project in `.tmx` format (`https://crowdin.com/project/<ORIGINAL_PROJECT>/settings#tm` > `View Records`)
- Upload the translation memory to your new project (`https://crowdin.com/project/<NEW_PROJECT>/settings#tm` > `View Records`)
- Reconfigure `crowdin.yml` for Docusaurus v2 according to the i18n docs
- Upload the Docusaurus v2 source files with the Crowdin CLI to the new project
- Mark sensitive strings like `id` or `slug` as "hidden string" on Crowdin
- On the "Translations" tab, click on "Pre-Translation > via TM" (`https://crowdin.com/project/<NEW_PROJECT>/settings#translations`)
- Try first with "100% match" (more content will be translated than "Perfect"), and pre-translate your sources
- Download the Crowdin translations locally
- Try to run/build your site and see if there are any errors

translations.zh-hant:
- 從原始專案下載翻譯記憶檔（`.tmx`格式）（`https://crowdin.com/project/<ORIGINAL_PROJECT>/settings#tm` > `View Records`）
- 將翻譯記憶檔上傳至新專案（`https://crowdin.com/project/<NEW_PROJECT>/settings#tm` > `View Records`）
- 根據i18n文件重新配置`crowdin.yml`以適應Docusaurus v2
- 使用Crowdin CLI將Docusaurus v2原始檔案上傳至新專案
- 在Crowdin上將敏感字串如`id`或`slug`標記為「隱藏字串」
- 在「Translations」標籤頁，點擊「Pre-Translation > via TM」（`https://crowdin.com/project/<NEW_PROJECT>/settings#translations`）
- 先嘗試「100%匹配」（會比「Perfect」選項翻譯更多內容），並預翻譯原始檔案
- 下載Crowdin翻譯至本地端
- 嘗試執行/建置網站並檢查是否有錯誤

segments.source_content: You will likely have errors on your first-try: the pre-translation might try to translate things that it should not be translated (front matter, admonition, code blocks...), and the translated MD files might be invalid for the MDX parser.

translations.zh-hant: 首次嘗試時很可能會遇到錯誤：預翻譯可能會嘗試翻譯不該翻譯的內容（front matter、admonition、程式碼區塊等），且翻譯後的MD檔案可能對MDX解析器無效。

segments.source_content: You will have to fix all the errors until your site builds. You can do that by modifying the translated MD files locally, and fix your site for one locale at a time using `docusaurus build --locale fr`.

translations.zh-hant: 您需要修復所有錯誤直到網站能成功建置。可以透過修改本地端的翻譯MD檔案，並使用`docusaurus build --locale fr`一次針對一個語言修復網站。

segments.source_content: There is no ultimate guide we could write to fix these errors, but common errors are due to:

translations.zh-hant: 我們無法提供修復這些錯誤的終極指南，但常見錯誤原因包括：

segments.source_content:
- Not marking enough strings as "hidden strings" in Crowdin, leading to pre-translation trying to translate these strings.
- Having bad v1 translations, leading to invalid markup in v2: bad HTML elements inside translations and unclosed tags
- Anything rejected by the MDX parser, like using HTML elements instead of JSX elements (use the [MDX playground](https://mdxjs.com/playground/) for debugging)

translations.zh-hant:
- 未在Crowdin標記足夠的「隱藏字串」，導致預翻譯嘗試翻譯這些字串。
- 存在不良的v1翻譯，導致v2中出現無效標記：翻譯中包含不良HTML元素和未閉合標籤
- 任何被MDX解析器拒絕的內容，例如使用HTML元素而非JSX元素（使用[MDX遊樂場](https://mdxjs.com/playground/)進行除錯）

segments.source_content: You might want to repeat this pre-translation process, eventually trying the "Perfect" option and limiting pre-translation only some languages/files.

translations.zh-hant: 您可能需要重複此預翻譯流程，最終嘗試「Perfect」選項並限制僅對部分語言/檔案進行預翻譯。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Use [`mdx-code-block`](../../i18n/i18n-crowdin.mdx#mdx-solutions) around problematic Markdown elements: Crowdin is less likely mess things up with code blocks.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

在問題Markdown元素周圍使用[`mdx-code-block`](../../i18n/i18n-crowdin.mdx#mdx-solutions)：Crowdin較不容易搞亂程式碼區塊內的內容。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::note

You will likely notice that some things were translated on your old project, but are now untranslated in your new project.

The Crowdin Markdown parser is evolving other time and each Crowdin project has a different parser version, which can lead to pre-translation not being able to pre-translate all the strings.

This parser version is undocumented, and you will have to ask the Crowdin support to know your project's parser version and fix one specific version.

Using the same CLI version and parser version across the 2 Crowdin projects might give better results.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note

您可能會注意到舊專案中某些已翻譯的內容，在新專案中卻未翻譯。

Crowdin的Markdown解析器會隨時間演進，且每個Crowdin專案的解析器版本可能不同，這可能導致預翻譯無法完整預翻譯所有字串。

此解析器版本未公開說明，您需要聯繫Crowdin支援以了解專案的解析器版本並固定特定版本。

在兩個Crowdin專案中使用相同的CLI版本和解析器版本可能會獲得更好的結果。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::danger

Crowdin has an "upload translations" feature, but in our experience it does not give very good results for Markdown

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::danger

Crowdin有「上傳翻譯」功能，但根據我們的經驗，對Markdown檔案的處理效果不佳

:::

segments.source_content: ### Use the existing Crowdin project {#use-the-existing-crowdin-project}

translations.zh-hant: ### 使用現有Crowdin專案 {#use-the-existing-crowdin-project}

segments.source_content: If you don't mind modifying your existing Crowdin project and risking to mess things up, it may be possible to use the Crowdin branch system.

translations.zh-hant: 若不介意修改現有Crowdin專案並承擔搞亂內容的風險，可以嘗試使用Crowdin的分支系統。

segments.source_content:
:::warning

This workflow has not been tested in practice, please report us how good it is.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning

此工作流程尚未經過實際測試，請回報使用效果。

:::

segments.source_content: This way, you wouldn't need to create a new Crowdin project, transfer the translation memory, apply pre-translations, and try to fix the pre-translations errors.

translations.zh-hant: 如此便無需建立新Crowdin專案、轉移翻譯記憶、應用預翻譯及嘗試修復預翻譯錯誤。

segments.source_content: You could create a Crowdin branch for Docusaurus v2, where you upload the v2 sources, and merge the Crowdin branch to main once ready.

translations.zh-hant: 您可以為Docusaurus v2建立Crowdin分支，上傳v2原始檔案，並在準備完成後將分支合併至主線。

segments.source_content: ### Use Git instead of Crowdin {#use-git-instead-of-crowdin}

translations.zh-hant: ### 改用Git而非Crowdin {#use-git-instead-of-crowdin}

segments.source_content: It is possible to migrate away of Crowdin, and add the translation files to Git instead.

translations.zh-hant: 可以完全遷移離開Crowdin，改將翻譯檔案加入Git版本控制。

segments.source_content: Use the Crowdin CLI to download the v1 translated files, and put these translated files at the correct Docusaurus v2 filesystem location.

translations.zh-hant: 使用Crowdin CLI下載v1翻譯檔案，並將這些翻譯檔案放置於Docusaurus v2正確的檔案系統位置。
